text: No kubayahudi twarababujije gufungura kubikoko bifise inzara, no kunka n’intama hamwe n’impene, tubabuza gufungura kubinure vyazo dukuyemwo iyihetse k’umugongo wayo, canke munda yazo canke iyanamvye n’amagufa yayo, uko niko twabahemvye kubera ubwiyonkore bwabo, ntankeka ni twebwe tuvugisha ukuri
